name: MetalGreymon
effect: [When Attacking] When this Digimon attacks a player, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 4000 DP or less.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Machine] or [Dragonkin] in its traits, it gains ＜Piercing＞. (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
